conversion_verification.notes: Successful 3D transformation with clear cutaway geometry.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent isometric perspective and volume; wall geometry is clean and consistent.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Major layout matches well. The bathroom/central block and stairs (rendered as blocks) are correctly positioned.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture represents the room functions (dining, living) correctly, though kitchen fixtures are simplified.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity and lighting. No text contamination. Minor rendering simplification on the stairs.

detected_errors.description: Some door swing markers from 2D are rendered as static door slabs or simplified openings.

summary: High-fidelity 3D conversion that accurately translates the 2D floor plan into a clean, geometrically sound isometric model.
